items.content_html: M3U Playlist Proxy is a lightweight server that lets you stream, customize, and manage IPTV M3U playlists with ease. Whether you're cleaning up bloated channel lists, adding authentication to protect your stream, or just want a better way to serve your playlists ‚Äî this tool gives you full control. With built-in support for filtering, and more

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
